text: “mimi bap dı «kæ brrda phu thi xxnxæ, læa kæ phu thi pwy khi læa kæ brrda phu thi mi phb sing thi ca bricakh meux phwk khea di næana takteuxn hı cngrakphakdi tx xallxh læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh mimi thang dı thi ca klawthosʹ kæ brrda phu kratha di di læa xallxh nan khux phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng xendu metta”
